title: Ghost - Infestissumam 2013
description:
Ghost is a Swedish heavy metal band, formed in LinkÃƒÂ¶ping in 2008. In 2010 they released their debut full-length album Opus Eponymous. The Grammis-nominated album was widely praised and increased their popularity significantly.
